name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles SHEPPARD, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles SHEPPARD, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The judgment of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Mary Bell Hammerman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Jane Greenspan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
428 A.2d 1337
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Charles SHEPPARD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 24, 1981.
Decided May 11, 1981.
Mary Bell Hammerman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Jane Greenspan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
